```{r Setup, echo = FALSE, include = FALSE}
library(fpp3, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
```

```{r Number of sheep slaughtered in Victoria}
sheep <- aus_livestock %>%
    filter(Animal == "Sheep") %>%
    filter(State == "Victoria")

training <- sheep %>% filter(year(Month) <= 2014)

fit <- training %>% model(SNAIVE(Count))

fit %>% forecast(h = 18) %>% accuracy(sheep)

fit %>% 
```
